text: Kerrye Daniels-Katz (born 26 March 1961) is an Australian judoka. She competed at the 1988 Summer Olympics, where judo was for women a demonstration sport, in the Middleweight event. She won the bronze medal at the 1977 Oceania Judo Championships in the -57 kg category; she was Oceanian Champion in 1985 in the -66 kg category. She was Australian champion eleven times. She was a judo coach. Katz is the mother of judoka Joshua Katz and Nathan Katz who both competed at the 2016 Summer Olympics. == References == Category:1961 births Category:Judoka Category:Living people Category:Australian martial artists
title: Kerrye Katz
